profile: With over 25 years experience in the waterproofing and foundation repair business Act Fast's Waterproofing dedicated team is committed to solving all types of basement and crawl space water problems,as well as structural repair issues.We know basement waterproofing.We are basement waterproofing!
products: The products we use for our basement waterproofing include type S cement,Delta MS or Platon dimple board,aqua bloc 720-38 asphalt membrane, poly sheeting, weeping tile, gravel and finishing strips.
specialities: Interior and exterior waterproofing and sump pumps
name: Act Fast Waterproofing

profile:
Welcome, We are McDowell Drain Services, an independent family owned business that is fully licensed and insured.  We have been looking after customers for over 30 years in the Niagara region for all drainage, sewage and related issues. Founded in 1989 we have continued to provide superior service to our customers with integrity & honesty. Earning an enviable reputation, we take pride in getting the job done right the first time. We are fully independent and not affiliated with any rooter franchise.

Serving the whole Niagara region districts of: Niagara on the Lake, Niagara Falls, Fort Erie, St Catharines, Thorold, Welland, Port Colborne, Grimsby, Lincoln, West Lincoln, Pelham, Wainfleet.

Our peace of mind guarantee: We will get the job done right the first time or we will come back for FREE. Phone us today on 647 285 9396 (24/7) or use our Contact Form.
services: All Drainage Issues. Clear Clogged Sewer. Repair Replace Sewers. Trenchless Sewer Replacement
specialities: Niagara's Choice for Sewer and Drain Services.
warranty_terms: 20 years on installed pipework and workmanship
